DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and minimum effective dose of intraspinal gabapentin when delivered through an implanted drug infusion system.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety and Effectiveness Study of Intraspinal Gabapentin (MDT2004) for the Treatment of Chronic Pain
DOC.criteria: Chronic pain below the neck present for a minimum of one year. Diagnosis of at least one of the following: back pain with or without leg pain, postherpetic neuralgia, complex regional pain syndrome (CRPS) 1 or 2, diabetic neuropathy, or a general neuropathic condition; medically stable and able to undergo surgery for implantation of the drug infusion system.
